IDML Pandoc reader
  • IDML Pandoc reader
  • View page source

IDML Pandoc readerÔÉÅ

The repository deborderbollore/idml-pandoc-reader contains a command-line program that automates the reading of IDML (InDesign Markup Language) files for Pandoc. Pandoc is a universal converter capable of transforming many input formats into many output formats, including DOCX, ODT, HTML, Markdown, AsciiDoc, etc. Only the document structure is converted; formatting is entirely ignored.

This program was developed in the context of the D√©border Bollor√© project, where it was necessary to bring together the expert skills of graphic designers using Adobe InDesign and web developers, with the goal of producing a multiformat publication accessible in any reading context.

In the long term, a web interface will make using this program easier. This interface will be called OutDesign, as a response to the consolidation in publishing software.
